name: Fish Out Of The Water
description:
Jun just wants to have an enjoyable fishing trip. Though, the moment she finally got something on the other end of the line... Things got...

fishy.

Art by : Kindvirus

Soundtrack and certain SFX : Fancyguy

(Soundcloud : https://soundcloud.com/fancyguy-official)

Other SFX : freesound.org (Creative Commons)

Actually just a demo for a fishy visual novel in the works.

This visual novel was created for the TyranoBuilder 2017 Spring game jam. It took about a week to complete this with the effort of 2 school students.
